metadata.description: The Retribution Industry is born, allowing for private-counter-terrorist forces to thrive, creating rival teams that fight for the industry's #1 spot. Following in the footsteps of their legendary fathers, martial arts mega-duo Ebony and Ivory become overnight media sensations, kicking ass in the name of justice along with their sexy, gun-toting chauffeur/bodyguard, Louisa, at their side. But now competition is on the rise...
metadata.name: JFH: Justice For Hire
